generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with lane markings, which is clearly a road where vehicles are driving.
- vegetation: There are visible trees and greenery along the roadside and in the background.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a clear blue sky with some clouds.
- car: A dark-colored sedan is visible directly ahead in the lane.
- truck: A white truck or trailer is visible on the right side of the road, partially obscured.
- pole: Several vertical poles, including streetlights and traffic signal poles, are visible along the road.
- traffic sign: A red and white traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, near the truck.
- fence: A metal guardrail runs along the left side of the road.
- wall: A concrete wall runs along the left side of the road, separating the roadway from an elevated structure.
